{"medsNode":"sahti_24","medsPercent":55,"medsPriority":0,"Description":"A group of pirates is sacking what appears to be a strange boat, half-submerged in the sea.

The boat, constructed from metal and glass, resembles an advanced prototype of a ship designed to go underwater. It is painted in the colors of the navy’s admiralty.

Smoke is emanating from it, suggesting it may not be functioning as intended. The crew of this vessel may be in danger, and it seems the pirates are preparing to flee.","DescriptionAction":"Will you get close and take a look?","EventIconShader":"None","EventID":"e_sahti24_a","EventName":"The nautical machine","EventSpriteBook":"even_sahti_subma","EventSpriteDecor":"sahtisub","EventSpriteMap":"nodeIconEventTeal","EventTier":"T0","EventUniqueID":"","HistoryMode":false,"ReplyRandom":0,"Replies":["{

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "The pirates flee when they see you approaching; it seems they’ve already gotten what they wanted. \r\n\nAs you get closer, you notice that the nautical machine is damaged, with water leaking inside, but you might have time to inspect it if you’re quick. You decide to board the submarine and explore it, but there’s no trace of the crew. \r\n\nThe machine is very narrow, and you unintentionally activate something, causing it to dive and sail to an unknown undersea facility on autopilot, with you inside.",

    "SSCRewardText": "The pirates flee when they see you approaching; it seems they’ve already gotten what they wanted. \r\n\nAs you get closer, you notice that the nautical machine is damaged, with water leaking inside, but you might have time to inspect it if you’re quick. You decide to board the submarine and explore it, but there’s no trace of the crew. The machine is very narrow, and you unintentionally activate something, causing it to dive and sail to an unknown undersea facility on autopilot, with you inside. \r\n\nFortunately, the machine seems prepared for this, and there’s a place to rest while it reaches its destination.",

    "FLCRewardText": "The pirates flee when they see you approaching; it seems they’ve already gotten what they wanted. \r\n\nAs you get closer, you notice that the nautical machine is damaged, with water leaking inside, but you might have time to inspect it if you’re quick. You decide to board the submarine and explore it, but there’s no trace of the crew. The machine is very narrow, and you unintentionally activate something, causing it to dive with you inside as some hatches open. \r\n\nYou rush to a safe location inside the submarine, but you get hit by some debris on your way there.",

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "You are getting used to the particularities of naval combat and prepare a strong attack.\r\n\nThe pirates scramble to defend themselves, but once they divert their attention from the submarine, it dives and quickly disappears into the depths of the ocean.\r\n\nIt seems that, at the very least, you’ve given the submarine a chance to escape!",

    "SSCRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSCRewardText": "You are getting used to the particularities of naval combat and prepare a strong attack. \r\n\nThe pirates scramble to defend themselves, but once they divert their attention from the submarine, it dives and quickly disappears into the depths of the ocean. \r\n\nThe submarine has escaped, and with no way to pursue, the pirates are forced to face you from a disadvantageous position!",

    "FLRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "FLRewardText": "The pirates seem disorganized as they continue sacking the submarine.\r\n\nIt’s unbelievable that they haven’t noticed your presence, but you’re not about to waste this opportunity! You charge at them, but it’s too late when you realize the trap they’ve prepared.\r\n\nYou fall into the submarine, and before you can react, they close the hatch above you. You find yourself submerged in the submarine, which appears to be navigating on autopilot toward an unknown undersea location.",

    "FLCRewardText": "The pirates seem disorganized as they continue sacking the submarine.\r\n\nIt’s unbelievable that they haven’t noticed your presence, but you’re not about to waste this opportunity! You charge at them, but it’s too late when you realize the trap they’ve prepared.\r\n\nYou fall into the submarine, and before you can react, they close the hatch above you. You find yourself submerged in the submarine, which appears to be navigating on autopilot toward an unknown undersea facility.\r\n\nUnfortunately, some hatches are damaged by the pirates' sacking, allowing gallons of water to infiltrate the submarine, and you end up swallowing a lot of it!",

{"medsNode":"sahti_24","medsPercent":45,"medsPriority":0,"Description":"You see in the distance a flagless ship chasing a big white whale. They seem to be in the process of hunting the creature.

Whales, besides being majestic animals, are revered by the people of these islands, so not even the COT dares to hunt them.

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "You don’t want to share your future trophy and decide to attack the whalers before focusing your attention on the whale. \r\n\nThey are aware of your maneuver and ram your ship with theirs, but your ship withstands the impact! \r\n\nThe ships are entangled with the harpoon and ropes linked to the whale, and you are forced to fight while the powerful animal drags you underwater.",
